Detailed Description

Generic RSComputer Class.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum BALL::RSComputer::AtomStatus

status of an atom 0 on surface 1 inside 2 outside

Enumerator:
STATUS_ON_SURFACE 
STATUS_INSIDE 
STATUS_UNKNOWN 
enum BALL::RSComputer::ProbeStatus

status of the probe positions of three atoms: 0 ok 1 not ok 2 not tested

Enumerator:
STATUS_OK 
STATUS_NOT_OK 
STATUS_NOT_TESTED
